activities.title: Zero rated loans
activities.description: Advance business loans and grants to refugees and other underprivileged groups

activities.title: Relocation
activities.description: Relocate and resettle refugees to peaceful and welcoming countries

activities.title: Refugee training
activities.description: Equip interested groups with farming skills to promote sustainable agriculture

activities.title: Community integration
activities.description: Integrate refugees and help them settle into new lives within their wider communities

activities.title: Job search
activities.description: Secure jobs for beneficiaries in a safe and friendly environment

activities.title: Goverment grants
activities.description: Assist minority groups to apply and secure goverment loans and grants
